message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $100 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! I'm happy to come down a bit, but $80 is just too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $90? This gives us both a fair deal.
I'm not sure I can meet you at $90, but I'm willing to go up to $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Bob, I understand you're sticking to your price point, but $85 still doesn't quite work for me. I'm willing to come down to $88 to make this deal happen.  Let's close this out and both be happy with the deal.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit off. I'd be willing to meet you at $82. That's the lowest I can go.
